meta.title: 99 Cents
meta.description: A small action. A choice of the strong.

home.title: 99 cents.
home.tagline: One click. No sign-up. No rewards.

cta.description: You send 99 cents and get nothing in return.
cta.note: No registration. No emails. No strings attached.

map.caption: Each dot is someone who did it.

voting.title: Voting
voting.subtitle: Choose the project that will receive the collected funds
voting.mustPay: To vote, you need to send 99 cents first

idea.title: The Idea
idea.content: 99 cents is an experiment in collective giving. We believe that small actions by many people can change the world.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
items: Your payment appears on the map
The winning project receives all funds

whatYouGet.title: What You Get
whatYouGet.content: Nothing material. Just the knowledge that you made a small but meaningful action. And a dot on the map.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.content: All transactions are public. All transfers to projects are documented. We take no commission.

full.title: Full Transparency
full.content: We believe trust is built on openness. Every cent you send is tracked and accounted for publicly.

publish.title: What We Publish
items: Number of participants and their geographic distribution
Reports on fund transfers to winners

blockchain.title: Blockchain Verification
blockchain.content: All USDC payments are recorded on the blockchain and can be verified by anyone.

reports.title: Monthly Reports
reports.content: Every month we publish a detailed report:

fees.title: Zero Hidden Fees
fees.content: We take no commission from your 99 cents. The only costs are payment processor fees (Stripe ~3% or blockchain gas).

steps.title: Fundraising
steps.content: Participants send 99 cents each. Funds accumulate during the voting period.

steps.title: Voting
steps.content: Participants vote for projects they want to support. One person — one vote per day.

steps.title: Winner Selection
steps.content: At the end of the period, the project with the most votes wins.

steps.title: Fund Transfer
steps.content: The entire collected amount goes to the winning project.

projects.title: Projects We Support
projects.note: Projects are vetted before being added to the voting.

distribution.title: Fund Distribution
distribution.note: We take no commission. All collected funds go to the chosen project.
